name: Warrior of the Wind
description:
Explore the world through the eyes of a wind elementalist. Purge the forests of the wild, learn new skills, and defeat the bosses of each area. Enjoy the ambient sounds, and the challenges of the game.

If you have any questions, or suggestions for future updates, or maybe you find a bug, please be sure to comment it so that I can take a look at them and make the game better.
